cofhworld.reload.failed: Failed to reload config; check your logs.
cofhworld.countblocks.usage: Count blocks of a type(s) within a given area.
cofhworld.countblocks.successful: A total of %s blocks were scanned, of which %s matched the provided filter(s).
cofhworld.countblocks.failed: Count blocks was unsuccessful with the specified command parameters.
cofhworld.replaceblocks.usage: Replace blocks of a type(s) within a given area.
cofhworld.replaceblocks.lag_warning: Replacing blocks in process. You may experience some lag while the process is under way.
cofhworld.replaceblocks.successful: Replacement of blocks was successful. %s blocks were scanned and %s blocks were replaced.
cofhworld.replaceblocks.failed: Replacement of blocks was unsuccessful with the specified command parameters.
